attributes.action: prioritize local jobs for local people to keep a sense of community in the area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have searched for a job for over six months  and I would very much like to stay in my local area (and I know many others are in the same position), unfortunately other people like the area and are moving taking over the local jobs and homes resulting in locals that have lived in the area all of their lives having to move to other areas of the country.
